about_the_game:
A murder is hiding among Fatal Train’s passengers. You play as the group of detectives, with a single goal - investigate brutal murders on board of the infinite train. Immerse yourself in an exciting multiplayer detective game where you're nowhere safe. Fate of every passenger is in your hands. Will you change the direction of this train or become its next victim?

Every time this sinister train enters a tunnel, one of the passengers disappears! Enter a world where every carriage is full of possibilities - and don't forget to leave your morals on the way out! After all, who cares about the “bad guys” when it comes to having fun!

Our train ride includes: A chance to win a gazillion dollars with our magnificent casino's, first-class whiskey and delicate foods by our~ AHH! Scrap that, we got a MURDERER among us!!!

Find out more about the passengers! Go through their belongings, open briefcases and watch their each. step. Search bodies to find clues that could lead to others! then let your revolver teach some manners.
